nodes.description: 2023年4月，巴安全部队在博格拉地区逮捕一名阿富汗间谍，其涉嫌策划俾路支省爆炸和暗杀事件
nodes.support_text: Security agencies had arrested a suspected Afghan spy in April this year, believed to be behind assassinations and bombings in Balochistan.

nodes.description: 2023年4月，巴安全部队在博格拉地区逮捕一名印度间谍，其非法入境并涉嫌策划俾路支省袭击
nodes.support_text: The move had come two weeks after the law enforcers detained another man it said was an Indian spy who illegally entered the country and was also captured in Balochistan.

nodes.description: 2023年X月X日早晨，巴俾路支省Chaman市发生针对高级警长Sajid Khan的汽车爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: CHAMAN: Senior superintendent of police (SSP) Sajid Khan lost his life in a roadside blast targeting his vehicle at a busy street in Chaman this morning, ARY News reported.

nodes.description: 爆炸发生后，救援和执法部门迅速抵达现场展开行动
nodes.support_text: The blast occurred near Boghra Road, prompting rescue and law and enforcement agencies into action and they rushed to the spot.

nodes.description: SSP Sajid Khan送医后因伤势过重死亡
nodes.support_text: SSP Sajid Khan’s vehicle was targeted in the blast and he suffered serious injuries. The senior cop was immediately moved to the hospital where doctors termed his condition critical, and moments later he breathed his last.

nodes.description: 爆炸后交火发生，安全部队封锁现场并调查爆炸原因
nodes.support_text: Reports suggest that the firing ensued shortly after the blast. Security agencies have cordoned off the area and determining nature of the blast.

nodes.description: Chaman地区所有医院实施紧急状态
nodes.support_text: Emergency has been imposed across all hospitals of the district.

nodes.description: 根据阿富汗间谍供词，安全部队查获大量武器弹药
报道建议解雇巴安全部队行动
nodes.support_text: Reports suggest the firing of security personnel

nodes.description: Paramilitary forces基于情报突袭了房屋
nodes.support_text: Paramilitary forces based on intelligence raided a house

nodes.description: 被逮捕的阿富汗人为阿富汗国家安全局工作
nodes.support_text: The arrested Afghan spy worked for the Afghan National Security Agency

nodes.description: 发言人Manzoor Ahmed陈述了事件
nodes.support_text: Spokesperson Manzoor Ahmed stated the incident

edges.support_text: Security agencies had arrested a suspected Afghan spy in April this year, believed to be behind assassinations and bombings in Balochistan.
The move had come two weeks after the law enforcers detained another man it said was an Indian spy who illegally entered the country and was also captured in Balochistan.
The blast occurred near Boghra Road, prompting rescue and law and enforcement agencies into action and they rushed to the spot.

SSP Sajid Khan’s vehicle was targeted in the blast and he suffered serious injuries. The senior cop was immediately moved to the hospital where doctors termed his condition critical, and moments later he breathed his last.
Reports suggest that the firing ensued shortly after the blast.
救援和执法部门迅速抵达现场展开行动后，医生对伤者进行诊断并宣布其生命体征消失
Emergency has been imposed across all hospitals of the district.
报道建议解雇事件后，解雇实际发生
Paramilitary raid occurred prior to the explosion targeting SSP Sajid Khan
The arrested spy's employment at NDS preceded evidence collection
Spokesperson statement preceded personnel firing reports
